channel.title: Linguistics on Truthmaker Semantics
channel.description: Recent content in Linguistics on Truthmaker Semantics

item.title: Applications
item.description: Unpublished Two-Dimensional Truthmaker Semantics Hasen Khudairi Extends the framework of exact truthmaker semantics with the resources of two-dimensional semantics. Keywords: philosophy modality linguistics Unpublished manuscript https://philarchive.org/archive/KHUTTS-2 The Whole Truth Stephan Krämer Formulates an account of what it means to give the “whole truth” and formally models it in exact truthmaker semantics. Keywords: philosophy language exact truthmaking linguistics In: Outstanding Contributions to Logic: Kit Fine, edited by Federico LG Faroldi and Frederik Van De Putte.

item.title: Theory
item.description: 2021 Routley Star and Hyperintensionality Sergei Odintsov and Heinrich Wansing Compares HYPE to Heyting-Ockam logic. Contains a characterization of HYPE as identical to a modal system introduced by Moisil. From the perspective of truthmaker semantics, these results can be understood as results about (a certain kind of) inexact truthmaker semantics. Keywords: logic modality inexact truthmaking linguistics In: Journal of Philosophical Logic 50: 33-56 10.1007/s10992-020-09558-5 2020 Logics of Synonymy Levin Hornischer Surveys various “logics of synonymy,” i.
